import React, { useState } from 'react' import '/home/dinashboul/React_contextApi/myapp/src/componenets/Home/homestyle.css' import axios from 'axios' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom/cjs/react-router-dom.min' import Fetching from '../Fetching' import { useAuth } from '../../contexts/AuthContext' function Home() { const {user}=use const {data}=Fetching('https://store-wbly.onrender.com/items'); console.log("the data is",data) return (
{data && data.map(item => (

{item.name}

{item.categories}

{item.description}

Price is {item.price}
))}
) } export default Home;
